title: PredictiX
description: The Comprehensive Health Diagnostics app utilizes advanced AI technology for early detection and precise prediction of various diseases.

title: BlogSphere
description: A dynamic and responsive blog application.This app allows users to create, read other's blogs, edit, and delete blog posts making it easy for users to engage with content.

title: CryptoSphere
description: A robust and real-time cryptocurrency tracker application which provides users with up-to-date information on various cryptocurrencies, including current prices, market trends, and historical data.
